company.name: Alex Karpov
company.description: I deliver enterprise-grade Ruby on Rails and React solutions, proven at global leaders like Samsung and Instacart.

hero.title: Stop Hiring Freelancers. Start Hiring a Technical Partner.
hero.subtitle: I deliver enterprise-grade Ruby on Rails and React solutions, proven at global leaders like Samsung and Instacart. Let's solve your complex business problems.

valuePropositions.title: AI-Enhanced Tools
valuePropositions.description: At Instacart, I designed and built GPT-4-powered tooling that automated API validation, cutting partner onboarding time from weeks to days.

valuePropositions.title: Expert Integrations
valuePropositions.description: I architected an enterprise Okta SSO integration for Dr. Bill (RBC Ventures), securely migrating 15,000+ healthcare professionals with zero downtime.

valuePropositions.title: Performance Optimization
valuePropositions.description: I led a Sidekiq upgrade for a fintech platform, optimizing asynchronous job processing and reducing average job completion time by 30%.

leadMagnet.title: Get The Playbook
leadMagnet.subtitle: Download My Free Guide: "The AI-Automation Playbook: How I Cut Partner Onboarding from Weeks to Days at Instacart"
leadMagnet.description: Learn the framework I used to leverage GPT-4 for API validation and code generation. Enter your email to get the free PDF.

testimonials.name: Senior Engineering Manager
testimonials.quote: Alex's mentoring and rigorous code reviews were pivotal in elevating our team's code quality and streamlining our development process. He's a true technical partner.

finalCTA.title: Ready to build your next-generation application?
finalCTA.subtitle: Let's discuss your project. I am available for project-based work, monthly retainers, and strategic audits.
